long_description: The Shimano XT SL-M780 10-speed shifters feature dual-control levers for fast shifting. The upper levers swing either way so you can use your thumb or forefinger. Instant release allows quick shifts. 2-position bracket lets you personalize the lever's position for a customized feel. Long levers improve access and feature ergonomic touch points. Optical gear displays float above the handlebar for easy clamp setting, and they are completely removable. Outer casing system and coated stainless-steel cable ensure supersmooth shifting; cable is included. Shimano XT SL-M780 10-speed shifters are compatible with double or triple front chainrings.
